description:
🦡 𝓑𝓮𝓪𝓾𝓽𝓲𝓯𝓾𝓵 𝓑𝓪𝓭𝓰𝓮𝓻 🦡, 
Did you find the Gold, Silver & Bronze Badgers or the ‘Legendary Badgers’ in the ‘Badger Coin Collection’? 

**𝐓𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐤 𝐲𝐨𝐮, 𝐖𝐞𝐥𝐥 𝐝𝐨𝐧𝐞 & 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬!**

**Features**
This badge gives you 88XP! With this XP you receive beautiful discounts on (also future) AYA collections.

Make sure to check the ‘Discord Den’ to receive even higher discounts.
https://discord.gg/BrBKcKGdXg

🍀 ℐ𝓃𝒻𝒾𝓃𝒾𝓉ℯ ℒℴ𝓋ℯ 🍀
𝒜𝒴𝒜 𝓃𝒶𝓉𝓊𝓇ℯ
name: Beautiful Badger Badge
